page.title: 05Health Centre & New Ramp.
page.content: The{Oxted Health Centre}is situated in Gresham Rd., just off the main High Street.{6 Doctors}take their surgeries in a large modern building. Patients make appointments to see their Doctor by 'phoning the Doctors' Secretary. { Surgery hours}are 8.45 - 10 a.m. and 5.15 - 6.30 p.m. There is a{Treatment {Room} where a nurse dresses wounds and gives injections to save the Doctors' time. There is also a{Baby Clinic}, {Weight-watchers}and{Ante-Natal Clinic. We are very lucky to have such good medical facilities near us. { * Ramp * }For 2 years money has been raised for a{RAMP}to be built at{Oxted {Station}so that{Mums}with prams,{old {people}with trollies &{disabled people in wheelchairs will be able to use the Station & Subway more easily. One shop is being knocked down, but a new shop- ping centre will be built by the ramp.
